title: Yonkers Fire Department to Begin Annual Fire Hydrant Inspection Tuesday, October 13 (City of Yonkers, ...
text: ( Source : City of Yonkers, NY ) YONKERS, NY - October 8, 2015 - The City of Yonkers Fire Department today announced the start of its annual fire hydrant inspections, set to begin Tuesday, October 13th throughout the City. Yonkers firefighters
